member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescriptionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescriptionExtensions.GetApiVersion(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Gets the API version associated with the API description, if any.
member.param: The API description to get the API version for.
member.returns: The associated API version or null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescriptionExtensions.SetApiVersion(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Sets the API version associated with the API description.
member.param: The API description to set the API version for.
The associated API version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescriptionExtensions.Clone(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of the current API description.
member.param: The API description to create a copy of.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions
member.content: Provides additional implementation specific to ASP.NET Core.
member.summary: Represents the possible API versioning options for the API explorer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.DefaultApiVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the default API version applied to services that do not have explicit versions.
member.value: The default API version. The default value is .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.AssumeDefaultVersionWhenUnspecified
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a default version is assumed when a client does does not provide a service API version.
member.value: True if the a default API version should be assumed when a client does not provide a service API version; otherwise, false. The default value derives from .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.ApiVersionParameterSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source for defining API version parameters.
member.value: The API version parameter source used to describe API version parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.GroupNameFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to create group names from API versions.
member.value: The string format used to format an API version as a group name. The default value is null.
member.remarks: For information about API version formatting, review as well as the and methods.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.SubstitutionFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to format the API version value substituted in route templates.
member.value: The string format used to format an API version in a route template. The default value is "VVV", which formats the major version number and optional minor version.
member.remarks: For information about API version formatting, review as well as the and methods.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.SubstituteApiVersionInUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the API version parameter should be substituted in route templates.
member.value: True if the API version parameter should be substituted in route templates; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Setting this property to true will also remove the API version parameter from the corresponding API description.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions.DefaultApiVersionParameterDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the default description used for API version parameters.
member.value: The default description for API version parameters. The default value is "The requested API version".

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionDescription
member.summary: Represents the description of an API version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionDescription.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The described API version.
The group name for the API version.
Indicates whether the API version is deprecated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionDescription.ApiVersion
member.summary: Gets the described API version.
member.value: The described API version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionDescription.GroupName
member.summary: Gets the API version group name.f
member.value: The group name for the API version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionDescription.IsDeprecated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the API version is deprecated.
member.value: True if the API version is deprecated; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: An API version will only be described as deprecated when all all corresponding service implementations are also deprecated. It is possible that some API versions may be partially deprecated, in which case this property will return true, but individual actions may report that they are deprecated.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext
member.summary: Represents an object that contains API version parameter descriptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The to provide API version parameter descriptions for.
The current API version.
The metadata for the API version parameters.
The configured API explorer options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.ApiDescription
member.summary: Gets the associated API description.
member.value: The associated API description.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.ApiVersion
member.summary: Gets the associated API version.
member.value: The associated API version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.ModelMetadata
member.summary: Gets the model metadata for API version parameters.
member.value: The model metadata for the API version parameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.Options
member.summary: Gets the options associated with the API explorer.
member.value: The configured API explorer options.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.AddParameter(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Versioning.ApiVersionParameterLocation)
member.summary: Adds an API version parameter with the specified name, from the specified location.
member.param: The name of the parameter.
One of the values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.AddQueryString(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the description for an API version expressed as a query string parameter.
member.param: The name of the query string parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.AddHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the description for an API version expressed as a header.
member.param: The name of the header.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.UpdateUrlSegment
member.summary: Adds the description for an API version expressed as a header.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiVersionParameterDescriptionContext.AddMediaTypeParameter(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the description for an API version expressed as a media type parameter.
member.param: The name of the media type parameter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.DefaultApiVersionDescriptionProvider
member.summary: Represents the default implementation of an object that discovers and describes the API version information within an application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.DefaultApiVersionDescriptionProvider.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Infrastructure.IActionDescriptorCollectionProvider,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiExplorerOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to enumerate the actions within an application.
The container of configured API explorer options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.DefaultApiVersionDescriptionProvider.Options
member.summary: Gets the options associated with the API explorer.
member.value: The current API explorer options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.DefaultApiVersionDescriptionProvider.ApiVersionDescriptions
member.summary: Gets a read-only list of discovered API version descriptions.
member.value: A read-only list of API version descriptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.DefaultApiVersionDescriptionProvider.IsDeprecated(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Abstractions.ActionDescriptor,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified action is deprecated for the provided API version.
member.param: The action to evaluate.
The API version to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the specified action is deprecated for the API version; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Enumerates all API versions within an application.
member.param: The provider used to enumerate the actions within an application.
member.returns: A read-only list of API version descriptions.

member.summary: Defines the behavior of a provider that discovers and describes API version information within an application.

member.summary: Gets a read-only list of discovered API version descriptions.
member.value: A read-only list of API version descriptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider.IsDeprecated(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Abstractions.ActionDescriptor,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified action is deprecated for the provided API version.
member.param: The action to evaluate.
The API version to evaluate.
member.returns: True if the specified action is deprecated for the API version; otherwise, false.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.SR.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.SR.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.SR.ApiVersionDisplayName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to API Version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.SR.DefaultApiVersionParamDesc
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The requested API version.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider
member.summary: Represents an API explorer that provides API descriptions for actions represented by controller action descriptors that are API version aware.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to retrieve model metadata.
The container of configured API explorer options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider.MetadataProvider
member.summary: Gets the model metadata provider associated with the API description provider.
member.value: The provider used to retrieve model metadata.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider.Options
member.summary: Gets the options associated with the API explorer.
member.value: The current API explorer options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider.Order
member.summary: Gets the order prescendence of the current API description provider.
member.value: The order prescendence of the current API description provider. The default value is 0.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider.ShouldExploreAction(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Abstractions.ActionDescriptor,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified action should be explored for the indicated API version.
member.param: The action to evaluate.
The API version for action being explored.
member.returns: True if the action should be explored; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Populates the API version parameters for the specified API description.
member.param: The API description to populate parameters for.
The API version used to populate parameters with.

member.summary: Occurs after the providers have been executed.
member.param: The current execution context.
member.remarks: The default implementation performs no action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.VersionedApiDescriptionProvider.OnProvidersExecuting(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescriptionProviderContext)
member.summary: Occurs when the providers are being executed.
member.param: The current execution context.
member.remarks: The default implementation performs no operation.
